configuration.name: widget_07603992422489201
configuration.stem: Use the photograph above to complete the sentences.

feedBack.firstWrongHint: Think about the relationship between cells and living things. How does this relationship apply to the bacterium and to a rock?
feedBack.finalWrongHint: The structures visible in the photo show that this bacterium is a unicellular organism. Rock are not living things. Therefore, rocks do not have cells and you would not see rock cells at any magnification.

configuration.paragraph:
This organism is <<Option1>>.
When viewing a rock at a similar magnification, you <<Option2>> see cells.
